title: Nature Domain
content:
On Save: Targets still take half damage.

GREATER RESTORATION

Touch a creature and negate any Charm, Petrification, Stun, or curse afflicting it.

Paralyse a creature. It can't move, act or react. Attacks from within 3m are always Critical Hits.

No effect on undead

18m WIS Save Concentration

Locust attack everyone within range, make the area Difficult Terrain, and impose Disadvantage on Perception Checks.

On save: Targets still take half damage.

18m CON Save Concentration

MASS CURE WOUN
